welcome_message_body: Welcome to Mauldin, where southern charm meets modern convenience. Known for its beautiful parks, friendly locals, and thriving community, we invite you to explore our city and enjoy all that it has to offer.

restaurants.name: Dinos
restaurants.description: Dinos is a american restaurant located in Mauldin.

restaurants.name: Sub Station II
restaurants.description: Sub Station II is a sandwich spot located in Mauldin.

restaurants.name: Tequilana
restaurants.description: Tequilana is a mexican restaurant located in Mauldin.

restaurants.name: Bojangles' Famous Chicken 'n Biscuits
restaurants.description: Bojangles' Famous Chicken 'n Biscuits is a fast food restaurant located in Greenville.

restaurants.name: Otto Izakaya
restaurants.description: Otto Izakaya is a asian restaurant located in Greenville.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Donaldson Center Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Donaldson Center Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greenville Downtown Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Greenville Downtown Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greenville Spartanburg International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: A concourse at Greenville Spartanburg International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: A concourse at Greenville Spartanburg International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pickens Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Pickens Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Spartanburg Downtown Memorial Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Spartanburg Downtown Memorial Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'SPA Free WiFi' from their device's list of available networks.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Anderson Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Anderson Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Oconee County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Oconee County Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
